High Prefect Took:
Glory to Orcs! Young adventurer, may the light of Eternal Flame illumine your way.
I am High Prefect Took of the Duda-Mara tribe. I am the representative of Orcs here.
Here many adventurers have embarked on their path. It is the place of qualification for future battles. Exhausting training resulting in self-confidence will let you be ready for everything.
